title: The Delaneys, My Parents and Me
description: When the Delaneys accompany Liam for dinner at his parents, Liam thinks his biggest problem is how to stop them discussing his abandoned art career. However, caught between his mother's recent knowledge of his sexual shenanigans, his father's artistic pride and the constant romantic demands of his beloved twins, does Liam have any chance of surviving the evening unscathed at all?
author: Anne Brooke
